00041 const double DRAWABLE_RADIUS = 50.0;    
00042 
00043 class Drawable
00044 {
00045 public:
00046     Drawable(Vector2D p = Vector2D(0.0,0.0), double o = 0.0,
00047              double r = DRAWABLE_RADIUS):

00049       Orientation(orientation),
00050       Radius(radius),

00054

00056       radiusSquared(r * r), circular(true), displaylist(0), visible(true),
00057       myWorld(NULL)
00058 
00059       {colour[0] = 0.5; colour[1] = 0.5; colour[2] = 0.5;
00060        MyWorld.init(this, &Drawable::GetWorld, &Drawable::SetWorld);}
00061 
00062     Drawable(Vector2D p, double o, std::vector<Vector2D> e):
00063       Location(location),
00064       Orientation(orientation),
00065       Radius(radius),
00066       RadiusSquared(radiusSquared),
00067       Visible(visible),
00068       Circular(circular),
00069

00071       radiusSquared(0.0), edges(e), circular(false), displaylist(0),
00072       visible(true), myWorld(NULL)
00073 
00074       {colour[0] = 0.5; colour[1] = 0.5; colour[2] = 0.5;
00075        MyWorld.init(this, &Drawable::GetWorld, &Drawable::SetWorld);
00076        if (edges.size() > 0) edges.push_back(edges.front()); }

00078     virtual ~Drawable() { if (displaylist != 0) glDeleteLists(displaylist, 1); }

00099     void            OffsetLocation(const Vector2D& pv)  { location += pv; }

00101                     {location.SetCartesian(location.x + x, location.y + y); }

00113     bool            IsPolygon()const    { return !circular; }

00160 void Drawable::SetColour(float r, float g, float b, float a) {
00161     colour[0] = r;  colour[1] = g;
00162     colour[2] = b;  colour[3] = a;
00163 }
00164 
00165 void Drawable::SetColour(const float* col)
00166 {
00167     colour[0] = col[0]; colour[1] = col[1];
00168     colour[2] = col[2]; colour[3] = col[3];
00169 }
